verses.verse: And the men<WH376> of Ephraim<WH669> gathered themselves together<WH6817>, and went<WH5674> northward<WH6828>, and said<WH559> unto Jephthah<WH3316>, Wherefore passedst thou over<WH5674> to fight<WH3898> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>, and didst not call<WH7121> us to go<WH3212> with thee? we will burn<WH8313> thine house<WH1004> upon thee with fire<WH784>. gathered: Heb. were called

And Jephthah<WH3316> said<WH559> unto them, I and my people<WH5971> were<WH1961> at great<WH3966> strife<WH376> <WH7379> with the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>; and when I called<WH2199> you, ye delivered<WH3467> me not out of their hands<WH3027>.

And when I saw<WH7200> that ye delivered<WH3467> me not, I put<WH7760> my life<WH5315> in my hands<WH3709>, and passed over<WH5674> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon<WH5983>, and the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into my hand<WH3027>: wherefore then are ye come up<WH5927> unto me this day<WH3117>, to fight<WH3898> against me?

Then Jephthah<WH3316> gathered together<WH6908> all the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568>, and fought<WH3898> with Ephraim<WH669>: and the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568> smote<WH5221> Ephraim<WH669>, because they said<WH559>, Ye Gileadites<WH1568> are fugitives<WH6412> of Ephraim<WH669> among<WH8432> the Ephraimites<WH669>, and among<WH8432> the Manassites<WH4519>.

And the Gileadites<WH1568> took<WH3920> the passages<WH4569> of Jordan<WH3383> before the Ephraimites<WH669>: and it was so, that when those Ephraimites<WH669> which were escaped<WH6412> said<WH559>, Let me go over<WH5674>; that the men<WH582> of Gilead<WH1568> said<WH559> unto him, Art thou an Ephraimite<WH673>? If he said<WH559>, Nay;

Then said<WH559> they unto him, Say<WH559> now Shibboleth<WH7641>: and he said<WH559> Sibboleth<WH5451>: for he could not frame<WH3559> to pronounce<WH1696> it right<WH3559>. Then they took<WH270> him, and slew<WH7819> him at the passages<WH4569> of Jordan<WH3383>: and there fell<WH5307> at that time<WH6256> of the Ephraimites<WH669> forty<WH705> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505>.

And Jephthah<WH3316> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> six<WH8337> years<WH8141>. Then died<WH4191> Jephthah<WH3316> the Gileadite<WH1569>, and was buried<WH6912> in one of the cities<WH5892> of Gilead<WH1568>.
And after<WH310> him Ibzan<WH78> of Bethlehem<WH1035> judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>.

And he had thirty<WH7970> sons<WH1121>, and thirty<WH7970> daughters<WH1323>, whom he sent<WH7971> abroad<WH2351>, and took<WH935> in thirty<WH7970> daughters<WH1323> from abroad<WH2351> for his sons<WH1121>. And he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141>.
Then died<WH4191> Ibzan<WH78>, and was buried<WH6912> at Bethlehem<WH1035>.
And after<WH310> him Elon<WH356>, a Zebulonite<WH2075>, judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>; and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> ten<WH6235> years<WH8141>.
And Elon<WH356> the Zebulonite<WH2075> died<WH4191>, and was buried<WH6912> in Aijalon<WH357> in the country<WH776> of Zebulun<WH2074>.
And after<WH310> him Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel<WH1985>, a Pirathonite<WH6553>, judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478>.

And he had forty<WH705> sons<WH1121> and thirty<WH7970> nephews<WH1121> <WH1121>, that rode<WH7392> on threescore and ten<WH7657> ass colts<WH5895>: and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> eight<WH8083> years<WH8141>. nephews: Heb. sons' sons

And Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel<WH1985> the Pirathonite<WH6553> died<WH4191>, and was buried<WH6912> in Pirathon<WH6552> in the land<WH776> of Ephraim<WH669>, in the mount<WH2022> of the Amalekites<WH6003>.
